verses.roman:
prabhu kahe,--ei 'sādhyāvadhi' suniścaya
kṛpā kari' kaha, yadi āge kichu haya

synonyms: prabhu kahe—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu replied; ei—this; sādhya-avadhi—the highest limit of perfection; su-niścaya—certainly; kṛpā kari'-being merciful to Me; kaha—please speak; yadi—if; āge—further; kichu haya—there is something.
translation: Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu replied, "This is certainly the limit of perfection, but please be merciful to Me and speak more if there is more."
